title: How Can We Create a Phenomenal Sex Life?
description:
Today, we’re talking with:
- A woman desiring a better sex life with her sexually traumatized husband (1:00)
- A wife wondering if the feelings she has toward her husband in rehab are normal (27:56)
- A single father whose tween is pulling away from him (38:31)
Lyrics of the Day: "Let's Talk About Sex" - Salt -N- Pepa
Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
